name: Prismano
description:
Forgot to mention that you can use middle click to freez rotation.

Also use "P" incase you are bad at the game.

Made for the brackeys gamejam 2021

Sadly i was sick and had little time this week so most of the game was made in the last 2 days.

If the game is unplayably laggy and or unbalanced i am sorry.

All of the music and sounds, code , art were made by me

Font: Liliput steps https://www.dafont.com/lilliput-steps.font
